ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: 1. A DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPOSED PROJECT INCLUDING A BUDGET, PROOF CONCERNING THE NEED FOR THE PROJECT AND THE PROJECT TIME THAT IT WILL REQUIRE TO COMPLETE SAID PROJECT 2. A COPY OF THE IRS RULING THAT THE ORGANIZATION IS TAX EXEMPT AND IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. 3. A COPY OF THE ORGANIZATION'S MOST RECENT FINANCIAL STATEMENT.
ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.RestrictionsOnAwardsTxt: THE MINIMUM AWARD IS 500 TO A MAXIMUM OF 5,000.
